PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-03582021-04-30,  ,  ,  PSPC,  CPC,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Post Corporation Act (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA POST CORPORATION ACT (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) correct discrepancies between the French and English versions; (2) add clarity to certain regulatory provisions; and (3) harmonize terms used in the regulations with those used in related regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0091 Publication Date: 2021-05-12
AttachmentsAttachment
